topic.title: Placing Directly on Floor or Raised Floor

body.p: The PDU can be moved on a fork lift or pallet jack and placed directly on a floor or raised floor. The floor must be capable of supporting the PDUâ€™s weight. See Section for approximate weights. PDUs are weighed when shipped and actual PDU weight is given on the bill of lading.
Check that required clearances are met when the PDU is placed in its operating position (see ).
